text:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on an article titled: Tools every Instagram creator needs to use in 2022.” 

I would love to talk to Instagram content creators, influencers, or marketers who have built an audience on Instagram. It would be helpful if you could share your firsthand experience with your favorite IG tools that you use to create, promote, and monetize your content. 

Would be happy to link back to your IG page :)
